abstract: After the merger, just think about the customer information now available to the group, which will have a giant foothold in beauty, men’s wear, women’s wear, sale shopping and shoe shopping.

headline.main: Yoox and Net-a-Porter Combine for Big Data Fashion Domination

snippet: After the merger, just think about the customer information now available to the group, which will have a giant foothold in beauty, men’s wear, women’s wear, sale shopping and shoe shopping.
